property_title: Detached Villa FOR SALE in Limassol, Vouni
property_description: This delightful 3-bedroom village house is located in the heart of Vouni village and combines traditional charm with modern comforts, making it an exceptional find. The property boasts two bathrooms, two terraces, and a beautifully designed courtyard with an external galleried walkway, offering a serene outdoor space. The spacious living room serves as the home’s focal point, featuring a classic archway and a stunning fireplace, adding both warmth and elegance to the space. There is access to a large terrace from here for alfresco entertaining. The kitchen is spacious, bright and airy, perfect for family gatherings or informal meals. Fully fitted with all modern appliances and large windows flooding the space with light. Food preparation here is definitely not a chore with village views and well-designed layout. Take a coffee at the breakfast bar and relax. Upstairs, the generously proportioned bedrooms are accessed via a covered galleried walkway overlooking the private courtyard, providing a picturesque and tranquil setting. The Master Bedroom has a beautifully presented ensuite. Across the courtyard is a third bedroom or office, ideal for visiting guests to enjoy this tranquil location in their own space. This unique home is a true gem, ideal for anyone seeking a peaceful retreat or a property brimming with character in the idyllic Vouni village. A rare opportunity that must be seen to be appreciated. Vouni is a picturesque village situated in the Limassol District of Cyprus, renowned for its traditional charm, historical significance, and stunning natural beauty. Located at an altitude of around 800 metres on the southern slopes of the Troodos Mountains, it offers breathtaking views of the surrounding vineyards, mountains, and valleys. The village has preserved much of its traditional architecture, with stone-built houses, narrow cobblestone streets, and picturesque courtyards, creating a timeless atmosphere. Vouni is known for its cool, pleasant climate, particularly in the summer months, making it a favoured destination for those looking to escape the coastal heat.

property_description:
Nestled in a prime location in Lower Chloraka, this beautifully renovated Santorini-style semi-detached house offers the perfect blend of Mediterranean charm and modern living. Just 100 meters from the sea, scenic coastal paths, popular beach bars, restaurants, and the main bus route, this corner property enjoys both tranquility and convenience in one of Paphos’ most sought-after neighborhoods.
Recently upgraded to an exceptionally high standard, the property features full thermal insulation throughout, including the roof, ensuring year-round comfort and energy efficiency. Upon entering, you are welcomed by a spacious, separate, and fully equipped kitchen — ideal for everyday living and entertaining. The home flows seamlessly into the sunken lounge area with a fireplace, where high ceilings, sliding windows, and a stunning artistic backdrop create a bright, serene, and inviting ambiance. The guest cloakroom completes the ground floor.
Upstairs, you’ll find two well-proportioned bedrooms and the family bathroom. From the hallway, a door leads to a charming balcony with a relaxing sitting area, offering delightful garden and sea views. An external spiral staircase takes you to the private rooftop terrace — a true highlight of the home. This spectacular space features multiple lounging and sitting areas, an outdoor gym, and breathtaking 360° panoramic views of the Mediterranean Sea and surrounding hillsides.
The outdoor area is nothing short of exceptional. Thoughtfully designed in a contemporary Santorini island style, it boasts a custom-built plunge pool, tranquil seating zones, and a holiday-inspired atmosphere that invites you to relax, entertain, and enjoy the Cyprus sunshine all year round. Whether you're looking for a stylish permanent residence, a luxurious holiday home, or a smart investment opportunity, this unique villa in Lower Chloraka is a must-see.
The property has Title Deeds and the price includes furniture, fixtures & fittings.
Chloraka is located 3 km north of Paphos Town and borders the tourist area known as the Tomb of the Kings. It is also home to Akritas Chloraka, a Cypriot Second Division football team. There are many hotels, restaurants and bars in this village which runs along the coast road from Paphos Town to Coral Bay. Chloraka’s location was put on the map in March 1998 when the cargo shop Demetrios II ran aground in heavy seas, the vessel is easily visible and has now become quite a focal point.

The village is at the top of the hill (250 m above sea level) with a marvellous view of the coastline. A walk in the park will give aesthetic pleasure and will, at the same time, be educational. Here you will make an excursion into the history of Cyprus at the stations depicting handicrafts of the villagers in the past and nowadays. A specially positioned information board will show a flora and fauna map of Cyprus. Your kids may play at the playgrounds, and after that, the whole family may go to the lake to enjoy the shade of the trees around. property_description:
This large home was renovated to the highest standards, with smart lighting, appliances, entertainment systems, aircon units, electric switches, Alexa etc. situated on a cul- de-sac in the heart of Paphos offering easy access to all amenities and services. A private smart garage and thoughtfully paved grounds invite you into the front garden. Upon entrance, you are warmly greeted by marble floors, a bright and open floor plan seamlessly connecting the office / entertainment area to the dining and living room with a fireplace and leading to the fully equipped kitchen. Meticulous attention to detail is presented in the kitchen with new top quality countertops, customized extractor, freshly finished cabinets, and brand-name appliances. Moreover the kitchen boasts a magnificent center island which offer the perfect balance for casual and formal entertaining alike. From the kitchen you can access the garage and sliding doors open to a private and bright back garden, complete with a built-in professional BBQ and relaxation / sitting areas. On the ground floor you will also find the guest cloakroom. Taking the beautiful staircase to the first floor you will find the comfortable family bathroom, the two double bedrooms and the spacious master bedroom with a walk-in closet, shower room and the private balcony. On this level you will also find the bonus room/fourth bedroom that provide additional flexibility and the open plan office with bookshelves and lots of storage space.
If you are looking for a renovated and very modern home with all the latest smart accessories then this unique home is ideal for you , perfect as a permanent home, holiday home or as an investment
The price includes furniture, fixtures and fittings and has Title Deeds

property_title: Detached Villa FOR SALE in Paphos, Tala
property_description:
If you are looking for a mature property, a property that is different to most. one that is tired and needs renovation, then we may have the place for you.This a property that can be configured into many different places as it sits on a double plot and in between two roads, within walking distance to the village square of Tala and has more unused building coverage that can be added to the building or plot.

The large entrance hall is welcoming with door into a corridor and a doorway into the lounge. The door a opens into a corridor that hides the kitchen/dining area, three bedrooms, a family bathroom and a guests cloak room.

A utility room at the kitchen has access to the plot. On the lower level of the property there are four large refrigerator storage rooms, an office, storage room and a lavatory. This area is currently been used for the storage of fruit and vegetables. Even further lower there is a plant/pump room.

A unique property with potential...also ideal for someone looking to construct a block of apartments.

The property includes some furniture, fittings and fixtures and has Title Deeds.

Tala is a large suburban village 6km north of Paphos Town home to many non-Cypriots who have decided to make this village either their summer residence or their permanent home. The village has many options for dining and socializing as well a bank, hairdressers, beauticians, bakery, mini-market and a traditional amphi-theater which hosts many wonderful nights of entertainment. Tala has become one of the most exclusive neighborhoods in the Paphos District, and is renowned for its cool summer breezes, its spectacular views, and its wonderful hospitality.  Tala is perfectly nestled in the hills, yet only 15 minutes from the center of Paphos.

Detached Villa FOR SALE in Paphos, Empa
property_description: This is a beautifully decorated, well-appointed three-bedroom villa with a spacious outside area.The property is located very close to the Cypriot village of Emba. Emba is a traditional Cypriot village, peaceful and quiet area. It is one of the largest villages of Paphos and is spread over a wide area that borders not only Paphos but the villages of Mesogi, Tremithousa, Tala, Kissonerga and Chloraka. It is said that the name Emba means "enter", this is possible that the name was given because it is built at the entrance of Paphos that is the edges of the city, through which the travelers from the north, northwest and west came in.  In the center of the village, you will find a new Greek Orthodox Church built near to the old one. The church is dedicated to the apostle Andreas (St. Andrew) and on his name day, 30th November, the village holds a religious festival within the church grounds. The village is charming with it is winding roads and lemon, orange and nectarine groves. Agriculture is the main industry of the area and as well as citrus fruits there are also peaches. Emba has a few shops and tavernas dotted along the narrow winding road that runs through the village. In the evening the local men can be seen sitting outside and often spilling out onto the narrow roads on their wooden chairs. The added bonus to choosing Emba for holidays is that in only minutes you can drive to Chloraka or Paphos Old Town to find all necessary amenities such as supermarkets, shops, banks, pharmacies, petrol station, tavernas and bars for entertainment. As you enter the property you will find a modernly furnished living and dining area which glass sliding doors will lead you to terrace where you can relax and admire the mesmerizing views of the garden. When reaching the first floor via the stairs there are three bedrooms. A master bedroom with double size bed, en-suite bathroom. Completing the bedrooms on this floor are a further one double and one twin bedrooms. The outside area can be accessed from the ground floor where you will find the backyard garden. The lounge offers comfortable sofa, wireless internet and a flat screen smart TV with TV box. Adjacent to this living and dining area you will find fully equipped kitchen. The dining area features a dining table and chairs comfortably seating 6.
